Text:
function RYU_EP05_12()
    -- .承-5【2月第2週】「背中合わせの告白」
    SaveData.Title = "背中合わせの告白"

    -- //CG：扉越しの逢瀬（ウランのみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV035aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav",0)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0853.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It's almost been a month, hasn't it?" ]])

    MSG([[ After realizing that it's already been nearly a month since I learned the truth about Erika Ikusa... no, Minato Ikusa’s lies, my heart aches. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0854.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Truly, the lowest person. Knowing that I can only love women, that I fear men, yet you’ve been mocking me behind my back all along." ]])

    MSG([[ Speaking words of resentment I’ve repeated countless times somehow eased the pain in my chest. ]])

    MSG([[ This is fine. As long as I keep venting these grievances, my lingering feelings for him won’t grow inside me. ]])

    MSG([[ Just as my father advised, I will keep my distance from all malice within this annex until the day I marry into the Rokujou family. ]])

    MSG([[ Because I never want to be betrayed by anyone again. ]])

    -- //CG：夕陽の中のエリカ・ウラン
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV017aa")
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)
    -- //effect：セピア加工

    -- //CG：扉越しの逢瀬（ウラン・涙）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV035ab")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0855.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Uuu..." ]])

    MSG([[ Fond memories of Erika Ikusa flashed through my mind, and tears welled up. ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t know how many tears I’ve shed already, but they just keep coming. ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t forget even a single memory I want to forget. ]])

    MSG([[ How inconvenient the human body is. ]])

    MSG([[ Once again, a sharp pain began in my chest. Whenever I think of Erika Ikusa, it hurts right away. ]])

    MSG([[ Ah, how infuriating. I should hate him deeply, but why do I only picture that crossdressing man’s face in my head? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0856.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I won’t forgive you. No matter what happened, I won’t forgive you. I cannot forgive you. I will never forgive you, Minato Ikusa. Minato Ikusa. Minato, Ikusa..." ]])

    MSG([[ Hoping the pain would disappear, I repeated my grievances. ]])

    MSG([[ Disappear. Disappear from within me. ]])

    MSG([[ Please disappear. ]])

    MSG([[ Please don’t torment me any further. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0857.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Why won’t you... disappear from inside me?" ]])

    MSG([[ I touched the boundary between here and the outside world where he must be living healthily and continued to spew hatred. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0858.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I hate Erika Ikusa... I loathe you! Liar! Pervert! Scoundrel! Damn you!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0859.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "This is the first time I’ve ever hated someone so deeply... I never want to see your face ever again!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0860.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "And yet..." ]])

    -- //CG：キスをするウラン
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV034aa")
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)
    -- //effect：セピア加工

    -- //CG：扉越しの逢瀬（ウラン・涙）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV035ab")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0861.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Why do I... want to see you so badly..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0862.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika Ikusa... I want to see you once more..." ]])

    -- //SE：足音
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    PLAY_SE("SEa016.wav")
    WAIT(1000)

    MSG([[ I heard footsteps I recognized. ]])

    MSG([[ Gentle enough to not even disturb the floor. They always calm my heart. ]])

    MSG([[ The footsteps I waited for every morning—came from beyond the door. ]])

    -- //CG：扉越しの逢瀬（ハッとするウラン）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV035ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2079.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Uran-san, I came to see you." ]])
    -- //エリカ

    MSG([[ For the first time in a month, the pain in my chest vanished. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //CG：扉越しの逢瀬（緊張するエリカ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV035ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Following the path taught by Ryuguuin-san. ]])

    MSG([[ I reached the annex of the Ryuguuin estate where Uran-san is being kept. ]])

    MSG([[ Standing before the door, I hesitated for a moment to open it. Even though I made it, would Uran-san listen to what I have to say? ]])

    MSG([[ I didn’t know if she could hear me, but I called out to her beyond the door. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2080.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san, I came to see you." ]])

    MSG([[ There was no answer. After all, I didn’t know if she could hear me, and I shouldn’t expect a reply from a sudden call. ]])

    MSG([[ I nearly held my head in frustration at how foolish I was. ]])

    MSG([[ But then―― ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0863.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "What do you want, Minato Ikusa?" ]])

    MSG([[ Surprisingly, there was a response. Uran-san’s words were filled with anger and continued without waiting for my reply. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0864.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I don’t know whose permission you have to be there, but please leave immediately. I have no reason whatsoever to want to see you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2081.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That’s true... I’m sorry. I have committed the worst kind of betrayal against you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2082.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "But at least, I wanted to properly apologize to you, Uran-san. That’s why I came here today." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0865.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I don’t want any apologies! Please leave!" ]])

    MSG([[ Strong rejection came flying from beyond the door. ]])

    MSG([[ I expected it, but it still hurt my chest. Yet I stood here now, borrowing the strength of many people. ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t leave without conveying my feelings properly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2083.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san, do you remember the day we first met at Yuriai Private Academy?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2084.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "The day I met you was right after I started crossdressing to investigate the truth behind the incident that involved Marika-neesan..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2085.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "You were the first person besides Marika-neesan whose feminine charm made my heart skip a beat." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2086.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Because I experienced crossdressing myself, I was moved by your femininity, your refinement, your very presence. Before I knew it, you became the most special woman in my heart." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0866.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "W-What on earth are you talking about!? I’ve been telling you to leave!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2087.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san, I like you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0867.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "...!" ]])

    MSG([[ Finally, I was able to convey my honest feelings. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2088.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I have told many lies. But the feelings I am sharing with you as Erika are true." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2089.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I love your sun-like smile. I love your awkward expressions of affection. I love how you’re unfamiliar with foreign culture and easily clumsy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2090.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I have always acted for Marika-neesan and Yuriai Academy, but being here now is not for anyone else—it's just my selfish wish." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2091.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’m sorry for hurting you until the very end... but I couldn’t help but tell you that my feelings toward you were genuine." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2092.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Goodbye, Uran-san. I will leave Yuriai Academy today, so if it’s alright, please come back to school." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2093.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Everyone is waiting for your return." ]])

    MSG([[ I said everything I wanted to say. ]])

    MSG([[ Things I couldn’t say in front of everyone. But from the start, I planned to leave Yuriai Academy today. ]])

    MSG([[ Because if I’m gone, Uran-san can return to school with peace of mind. ]])

    MSG([[ If my disappearance can protect Yuriai Academy and Uran-san’s smile, I think that’s a wonderful thing. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2094.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Sorry for the long talk. Goodbye, Uran-san... please take care." ]])

    MSG([[ Just as I turned to leave from the door―― ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0868.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Wait, please." ]])

    -- //CG：扉ごしの逢瀬（エリカ驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV035ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0869.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "You really are a sly one... leaving a gaping hole in my heart." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2095.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "A hole...!? S-Sorry, did I say something awful to you again...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0870.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes. You said exactly the words I never wanted to hear." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san’s voice changed from earlier to a calm tone as she continued. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0871.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "You started crossdressing to save Marika-sama, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2096.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-Yes. At first, it was unavoidable to clear up a misunderstanding... but at Yuriai Academy, if you don’t get close to the 'Princesses,' you can’t get much information." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2097.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I really hated it, but I had no choice but to crossdress." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0872.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "You hated it? Deep down, you were glad to be in an all-female environment, weren’t you?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "N-No way! I was so worried every day that I’d be found out, I had no time to be happy about it!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0873.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Is that so? I seem to recall a time when you buried your face in my chest, blushing." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2099.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "T-That was because you were the one who did it! I’m still a guy, you know... even if I try to suppress it, bodily functions still happen!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0874.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Fufu..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2100.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "U-Uran-san?" ]])

    -- //CG：扉ごしの逢瀬（ウラン泣き笑い・エリカ苦笑）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV035af")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0875.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Fufufu, ahahaha! Erika-san... You have such a cute face but were carrying such a struggle all this time." ]])

    MSG([[ From beyond the door came a very bright laugh. ]])

    MSG([[ It wasn’t a sarcastic laugh. It was a voice so cheerful I could almost see the joyful expression. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0876.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Somehow... I’ve started to feel foolish for being so closed off. The more I listen, the more you seem exactly like the Erika-san I know so well." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-I’m embarrassed to hear that... but I don’t think I was very good at acting. Especially lately." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0877.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Why are you leaving Yuriai Academy?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2102.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh!? W-Well, as atonement for lying and hurting you and so many others..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0878.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "That’s not atonement. It’s just running away." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0879.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "You’re saying you’ll leave a big hole in our hearts and run away? That’s the thing I least wanted to hear." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2103.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Th-Then what... what do you want me to do?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0880.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "You stole many precious firsts from me, Erika-san. You have a duty to keep playing the part of Erika until the very end." ]])

    MSG([[ My heart raced at those unexpected words. ]])

    MSG([[ Could it be―― ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0881.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "As you said, I will return to Yuriai Academy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0882.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "But I won’t come back unless Erika-san comes with me. Please attend Yuriai Academy together with me again." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2104.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "U-Uran-san――" ]])

    MSG([[ I flung open the obstructing door before me. To hold the hand of the person most important to me once again. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP05_13")
end
